about.title: About the training center
about.paragraph1: Prytula Foundation Training Center is a modern educational platform for training Armed Forces of Ukraine servicemen.
about.paragraph2: We provide quality training using state-of-the-art equipment and methodologies.
about.paragraph3: Our mission is to equip Ukraine's defenders with the knowledge and skills for victory.

ecosystem.title: Foundation ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Full support from Prytula Foundation: from training to equipment provision

full-cycle.title: Full cycle
full-cycle.description: Comprehensive training from basic skills to combat application

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Instructors with real combat experience and international certifications

results.title: Results
results.description: 150+ trained specialists defending Ukraine on the front lines

registration.title: Ready to start training?
registration.subtitle: Fill out the application and our team will contact you soon.

modal.title: Course registration

donate.title: Support the training center

partnerships.title: Partnerships
partnerships.description: We are open to cooperation with organizations and companies that share our mission of supporting Ukraine's defenders.
